products.name: Warli Art Coasters (Set of 4)
products.description: Set of four wooden coasters, hand-painted with intricate Warli art, perfect for adding a touch of ethnic charm to your home.

products.name: Pashmina Shawl with Sozni Embroidery
products.description: An exquisite Pashmina shawl from Kashmir featuring delicate Sozni hand-embroidery. A timeless piece of wearable art.

products.name: Blue Pottery Ceramic Vase
products.description: A stunning ceramic vase made with traditional Blue Pottery techniques of Jaipur, featuring intricate floral patterns in vibrant blue and white.

products.name: Dhokra Turtle Paperweight
products.description: A charming turtle paperweight, handcrafted using the ancient Dhokra art form of metal casting. A unique and functional piece of decor.

products.name: Kutch Leather-work Journal
products.description: A beautiful leather-bound journal featuring traditional Kutchi embroidery. The perfect blend of rustic charm and intricate detail.

products.name: Channapatna Wooden Toys
products.description: A set of safe, eco-friendly wooden toys from Channapatna, colored with natural, non-toxic lacquers. Bright, cheerful, and full of character.

products.name: Bidri-work Trinket Box
products.description: An elegant trinket box made with Bidriware, a metal handicraft from Bidar. It features a dark zinc alloy inlaid with pure silver wire.

products.name: Tanjore Painting of Ganesha
products.description: A classic Tanjore painting depicting Lord Ganesha, characterized by rich colors, gold foil, and semi-precious stone inlays. A divine addition to any wall.
